featured.text: These two countries are trying to ________ trade and cultural exchanges between them.
Churchill, however, managed to get the better of this exchange.
Exchange sites recommend that swappers discuss such matters ahead of time.

other.text: Founded in 1992, with some 28,000 listings, this company itself as the world’s largest home exchange club, reporting that membership has increased 30% this year.
Whenever two people come together, even for a brief moment, they exchange looks, feelings, thoughts, ideas, and energy.
What is the second paragraph mainly about? (A) How to exchange homes.
How home exchange is becoming popular.

definition.en_def: To give something and receive something of the same kind in return.
definition.example: They decided to exchange gifts during the holiday.
